themes.scientific_basis: Based on behavior change theories, such as BJ Fogg's Tiny Habits framework.
themes.description: This theme helps couples introduce small, manageable habits into their daily routines, creating sustainable and positive changes in their lifestyle together.

themes.scientific_basis: Drawn from social support theory, emphasizing the role of accountability in habit formation.
themes.description: This theme encourages couples to support each other in maintaining healthy habits, fostering motivation and shared commitment to personal and relationship goals.

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in mindfulness research and its benefits for mental and emotional health.
themes.description: This theme introduces mindfulness practices, such as meditation or deep breathing, to help couples reduce stress and enhance presence in their relationship.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by research on the positive impact of physical activity on relationships.
themes.description: This theme promotes exercising together as a couple, combining the benefits of physical health with bonding through shared activities like walks, yoga, or gym sessions.

themes.scientific_basis: Based on nutritional psychology and its effects on mental and relational well-being.
themes.description: This theme helps couples plan and prepare nutritious meals together, encouraging healthy eating habits that boost both energy and mood.

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in research on technology's impact on relationships and mental health.
themes.description: This theme guides couples in reducing screen time and creating tech-free zones, enhancing face-to-face interactions and emotional connection.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by positive psychology research on gratitude and its relational benefits.
themes.description: This theme encourages couples to incorporate daily or weekly gratitude practices, such as sharing three things they appreciate about each other, fostering positivity and closeness.

themes.scientific_basis: Drawn from sleep research emphasizing the importance of rest for overall well-being.
themes.description: This theme helps couples prioritize quality sleep and relaxation habits, creating a more energized and harmonious dynamic in their relationship.

themes.scientific_basis: Based on research into shared activities and intellectual growth in relationships.
themes.description: This theme encourages couples to learn something new together, such as taking a class or reading a book, fostering growth and shared achievements.
This theme promotes regular check-ins to discuss goals, feelings, and progress, helping couples stay aligned and motivated in their journey toward healthier habits.
